--- File name : explore_raid_node_render_unit.lua.txt
--- DataTime : 2023/05/29
--- Description : 
---

local data = data
local tables = tables

local super = require "game/systems/explore/node/explore_node_render_unit"

---@class explore_raid_node_render_unit : explore_node_render_unit
local explore_raid_node_render_unit = class("explore_raid_node_render_unit", super)

--region base api

---构造方法
---@protected
---@param cs_node_unit Game.Explore.ExploreNodeUnit
---@param node_data explore_node_data
function explore_raid_node_render_unit:ctor(cs_node_unit, node_data)
    super.ctor(self, cs_node_unit, node_data)
    self.effect_id = nil
end

---@public
function explore_raid_node_render_unit:dispose()
    super.dispose(self)
    if nil ~= self.effect_id then
        effect.manual_unload_effect(self.effect_id)
        self.effect_id = nil
    end
end

---初始化绑定器
---@protected override
function explore_raid_node_render_unit:init_binding()
    super.init_binding(self)
    self:create_simple_property("is_lock", nil, true)
    self:create_simple_property("node_name", nil, true)
end

--endregion

--region logic

---显示列表元素
---@protected override
function explore_raid_node_render_unit:show_item()
    super.show_item(self)
    
    ---@type ExploreRaid
    local raid = data.get(tables.ExploreRaid.name, self.node_data.node.EventParam)
    self.node_name = raid.NodeName
end

---设置节点显/隐
---@protected override
---@param is_active boolean
function explore_raid_node_render_unit:set_active(is_active)
    self.cs_unit:SetActive(is_active)
    if self.node_data.state <= 0 then
        self.is_lock = true
    else
        self.is_lock = false
    end
end

---刷新到达状态
---@public
function explore_raid_node_render_unit:update_arrived_stata()

end

---@public
function explore_raid_node_render_unit:play_active_effect()
    if not string.is_nil_or_empty(self.node_data.node.Effect) then
        self.effect_id = effect.play_effect_async(self.node_data.node.Effect, self.obj, 1)
    end
end

--endregion

return explore_raid_node_render_unit
